target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003500_DUMMYARDBERTあらゆるものを失い、
ときに命まで懸けなければならなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003510_ELIDIBUS<tab>You bear the burden and fight on, kicking and screaming until your last breath is spent!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003510_ELIDIBUSそれでも役目を背負い続けることの、
最後まで足掻くことの、何が悪いッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003520_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>You bear the burden and fight on, kicking and screaming until your last breath is spent!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003520_DUMMYARDBERTそれでも役目を背負い続けることの、
最後まで足掻くことの、何が悪いッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003530_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-Voice from Within-)Aye, it's true. We've lost much and more. Known unimaginable suffering.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003530_WARRIOROFDARKNESS(-魂の奥から響く声-)……ああ、そうだな。
確かに、俺たちはいろんなものを失った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-Voice from Within-)But through it all, we never, ever forgot what was dear to us. And that's what gave us the strength to carry on.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS(-魂の奥から響く声-)だが、自分にとって大切なものを忘れたりはしなかった。
それでこそ進んだんだ。
だから――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Elidibus...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>エリディブス……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You've no fight left to fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前はもう戦えない、戦う目的がない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I will put an end to this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ここで、終わりにしよう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003550_ELIDIBUS<tab>No! NO! It will not end here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003550_ELIDIBUS<tab>いいや、まだ……終わりになど、するものか……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003560_ELIDIBUS<tab>Champions from beyond the rift, heed my call! The time is come to deliver your brethren from darkness!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003560_ELIDIBUS応えよ、あまねく世界の英雄たち……！
運命に憤り、救いのために武器を取りし者たちよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003570_ELIDIBUS<tab>My heart's sole desire is a world free of sorrow. Join with me now in hope and prayer...for the salvation of all!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003570_ELIDIBUS我が行く道の先に待つは、悲しみなき世界。
さあ祈り、願え、我らがすべてを救わんと……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003580_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)If you would usher in the end, then with my all shall I oppose you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003580_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-エリディブス-)お前が終わりをもたらさんとするなら、私はそれに抗おう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003590_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-Elidibus-)...As the avatar of those mortal heroes who fought unfalteringly, in all their imperfection! As the Warrior of Light incarnate!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003590_ELIDIBUS(-エリディブス-)みじめにも、無様にも、なお戦い続けんとした、
なりそこないの英雄たち……
ウォーリア・オブ・ライトの名を以って！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003600_ELIDIBUS<tab>Come, Warrior of Darkness! Let us finish this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003600_ELIDIBUS<tab>勝負だ、闇なる名で呼ばれし者よ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003610_ELIDIBUS<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003610_ELIDIBUS<tab>なっ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003620_EMETSELCH<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Herein I commit the chronicle of the traveler. Shepherd to the stars in the dark.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003620_EMETSELCH命のかぎり歩み 地上の星々を繋がんとした
親愛なる者の記録をここに

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003630_EMETSELCH<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Though the world be sundered and our souls set adrift, where you walk, my dearest friend, fate shall surely follow.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003630_EMETSELCHお前が手繰れば 運命は集うだろう
たとえ今は天地に隔たれ 心隔たれていようとも

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003640_EMETSELCH<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>For yours is the Fourteenth seat─the seat of Azem.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003640_EMETSELCH<tab>第十四の座―― その名を  アゼム

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003650_ELIDIBUS<tab>An invocation of eld...though not of Hydaelyn's making... What are you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003650_ELIDIBUSいにしえの術式……しかも、ハイデリンの気配がない……。
お前は、いったい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003660_ELIDIBUS<tab>No─it matters not! You are the enemy, and you will fall! Even should it cost me everything, I will not forsake my duty!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003660_ELIDIBUS……いいや、いかなる者であれ、討ち果たしてみせよう。
私のすべてが擦り切れたとて、この剣は収めるものか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003670_ELIDIBUS<tab>Fool! You have achieved nothing! I am immortal, and I will never surrender!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003670_ELIDIBUS見くびるな……私は、不滅なる者……。
まだ、戦える……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003680_ELIDIBUS<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003680_ELIDIBUS<tab>く！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Elidibus. So fixated were you on my memories of the future, you failed to heed the lessons of the past.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003690_MYSTERYVOICE捕らえたぞ……！
お前も、私の「未来の」記憶ばかり気にしていたのだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Your obsession blinded you to the true nature of this tower─this beacon of hope for mankind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003700_MYSTERYVOICEだが、忘れるな。
この塔は、過去から届いた希望だ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Created to serve as a reservoir for the limitless energy of the heavens! To harness and bind the boundless─not unlike white auracite!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003710_MYSTERYVOICEアラグの時代、こいつは天より注ぐ力を受けるために作られた！
いうなれば……特大の白聖石だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Your ill-begotten power, obtained by exploiting that which is best in us... I shall have it, your soul and all!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003720_MYSTERYVOICE我が民の心、そして英雄たちの心を利用してお前が得た力……
その魂ごとまとめて、いただくぞッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003730_ELIDIBUS<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003730_ELIDIBUS<tab>ぐあぁぁぁぁ……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003740_ELIDIBUS<tab>This...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003740_ELIDIBUS<tab>これは…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003750_ELIDIBUS<tab>Yes... I would become Him. I would save everyone. This I believed. Yet still they cried out, in rage and despair...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003750_ELIDIBUSああ……そうだ…………。
ゾディアークになれば、みんなを救えると思って……
けれど、なった後にも、仲間たちの嘆きが聞こえたんだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003760_ELIDIBUS<tab>Divided─over the fate of the star. A rare occurrence, always fleeting. But not this time. Not this time...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003760_ELIDIBUS世界の行く末について、たくさんの意見が出た……
そんなことは珍しいから、委員会のみんなが悩んでいた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003770_ELIDIBUS<tab>Reconciliation. Elidibus. I was needed. I withdrew myself from Zodiark. For them...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003770_ELIDIBUSだったら、エリディブスが手助けしに行かないと……
そう思って、ゾディアークから零れ落ちたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003780_ELIDIBUS<tab>My people. My brothers. ...My friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003780_ELIDIBUS<tab>そう……私は、好きだったんだ……彼らのことが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003790_ELIDIBUS<tab>Stay strong. Keep the faith. At duty's end, we will meet again. We will. We will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003790_ELIDIBUS役目をやり遂げたら、もう一度見られると思っていたんだよ。
彼らの、幸せそうな笑顔を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003800_ELIDIBUS<tab>The rains have ceased, and we have been graced with another beautiful day. But you are not here to see it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003800_ELIDIBUS<tab>私が最後に残ったって……仕方ないじゃないか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I concede, I may have overexerted myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>……すまない、ちょっと張り切りすぎた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Steady now, and listen. I told you before that I had a plan, and that when all was said and done, I would ask a favor of you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003820_MYSTERYVOICEこの前、水晶公としてやるべきことを果たしたら、
話したいことがあるって言っただろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We have averted the Eighth Umbral Calamity. Found a way for everyone to return to the Source, and...last but not least, we have secured the future of all the people of Norvrandt. We have won, my friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003830_MYSTERYVOICE第八霊災の要因を退け、
喚んでしまったみんなを返す方法を見つけ出し……
クリスタリウムの民も……これでもう、どんな夢でも見られる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So I hope you'll forgive me this moment of selfishness. And...while I wouldn't want you to feel obliged...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>だから……笑い飛ばしてもいいから、聞いてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Promise me you'll take me on your next adventure. A journey. Together. That's all I ask.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003850_MYSTERYVOICE(-グ・ラハ・ティア-)あんたと、旅がしたい。
次の冒険には、きっとオレを連れてってくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I promise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>わかった、約束だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You could've asked me earlier!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>……言うのが遅い！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>へへっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If I were to tell you that this isn't the end─that we will meet again─would you believe me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-グ・ラハ・ティア-)なら……また再会できるって、信じてくれるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-グ・ラハ・ティア-)……ありがとう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My friend. With you, my mind and memories shall travel to the ends of the world and beyond. But in this place shall my body stand immovable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003890_MYSTERYVOICE(-グ・ラハ・ティア-)この記憶と魂は、あなたとともに彼方へ。
されどこの身は、この場所に……胸を張って立ち続けよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>May it serve as an undying promise, not only to those who looked to me for leadership, but to any soul who has known despair, that hope is everlasting.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003900_MYSTERYVOICE(-グ・ラハ・ティア-)私を公と呼んでくれた民と、この世界に……
希望は明日へ継がれていくのだと、物語り続けるために。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003910_RYNE<tab>There the Exarch would remain, keeping his silent vigil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003910_RYNE<tab>――事実  そこに水晶公が立ち続けているからなのでしょう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003920_RYNE<tab>When the Scions were not released from his summoning spell, we proceeded with the plan to return them to the Source.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003920_RYNEみなさんは急にもとの世界に返されることもなく
予定どおりの方法で 帰還を試みることになりました

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003930_RYNE<tab>The Warrior of Darkness, however, retained <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> ability to traverse the two worlds at will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003930_RYNE闇の戦士と呼ばれた かの人も
ふたつの世界を渡ることができるまま

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003940_RYNE<tab>And in time the Crystal Tower became a symbol of his link to the First─and of hope.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003940_RYNEクリスタルタワーは この世界と彼を繋ぐ
永遠の道しるべとなったのでした――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003950_RYNE<tab>And in time the Crystal Tower became a symbol of her link to the First─and of hope.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003950_RYNEクリスタルタワーは この世界と彼女を繋ぐ
永遠の道しるべとなったのでした――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003960_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh... Oh, Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003960_DULIACHAI<tab>ううぅぅ……ぐすっ……うぅぅぅー……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Please, Lady Chai, dry your eyes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003970_ALPHINAUD<tab>ドゥリア夫人、どうか落ち着いて……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003980_DULIACHAI<tab>The thought of never seeing you again... It's more than my poor heart can bear!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003980_DULIACHAI嫌……嫌よぅ……アルフィノちゃんと、永遠にお別れなんて！
そんなの……そんなの……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003990_DULIACHAI<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_003990_DULIACHAI<tab>うっうっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004000_CHAINUZZ<tab>Oh, it's you. As you can see, Alphinaud has broken the news.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004000_CHAINUZZああ、お前か……。
これは……まあ、見てのとおりなのだが……
アルフィノから事情を聞かされてな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004010_CHAINUZZ<tab>I don't know how to console her. She thinks we'll be lost without him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004010_CHAINUZZそれからずっとこの調子なのだ……。
私ももう、何と慰めればいいやら……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're certainly well loved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>愛されてるね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Make sure you leave nothing unsaid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>言い残すことがないように

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>A picture paints a thousand words!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>画伯、しっかり！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004020_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis more than I deserve. Yet I am truly grateful, and will see that she knows as much.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004020_ALPHINAUD本当に、身に余る光栄だよ。
となれば、私もきちんと想いを尽くさなければならないね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed, my friend. Nothing unsaid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004030_ALPHINAUD<tab>確かに……そのとおりだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004040_ALPHINAUD<tab>You'll never let me forget it, will you. I'll have you know I completed the promised painting in the end. Be that as it may, there are times only words will suffice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004040_ALPHINAUDまったく、いつまでも引っ張らないでくれ！
約束していた絵は描き上げたから……
あとは、言葉を尽くすだけだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lady Chai, I have a confession to make.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004050_ALPHINAUD<tab>ドゥリア夫人、どうか聞いてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004060_ALPHINAUD<tab>On the day we ousted Lord Vauthry, when I revealed the truth of his tyranny and your complicity in his crimes, I did so with great trepidation. Not out of fear that you wouldn't listen, but that you might never recover.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004060_ALPHINAUD実は……私はかつて、
救済の理想を追い求めて大掛かりな組織を作り、
手痛い失敗をしたことがあるのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004070_ALPHINAUD<tab>There was a time when I too, in my hubris, believed myself worthy to lord it over others. And when the lie was laid bare─when I was forced to confront the cost, the lives lost─it all but destroyed me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004070_ALPHINAUD……いえ、失敗などという言葉では生ぬるい。
それで命を落とした仲間さえいましたから……
間違いなく、私の罪でありましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004080_ALPHINAUD<tab>To awaken from a naive dream to so harsh a reality... I would have understood had you all surrendered to despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004080_ALPHINAUD一方的に理想を成し遂げようとするヴァウスリーのことも、
そのころの自分と、どこか重ねて見ていたのかもしれません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004090_ALPHINAUD<tab>But you didn't surrender. Far from it. You picked yourselves up and rose to the challenge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004090_ALPHINAUDだからこそ、私は……
この街の皆が再起したことが、嬉しかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004100_ALPHINAUD<tab>You found a path forward and the strength to walk it─and to keep walking it─day after day.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004100_ALPHINAUDそれは、自分の罪がそそがれるからではない……。
人は何度でも新たな理想を見つけ、歩きだせるということに、
勇気をもらったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004110_ALPHINAUD<tab>But what struck me is how much faster you found it than I did.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004110_ALPHINAUDこの胸に灯してもらった火を大切にして、
私もまた、歩んでいきたいと思います。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004120_CHAINUZZ<tab>...Really? It felt pretty slow to me! But rest assured, we'll make Eulmore into a nation anyone would be proud to call home...eventually.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004120_CHAINUZZああ、私たちもきっと、
ユールモアをすばらしい都市にしてみせよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004130_CHAINUZZ<tab>You can still come and go as you please, I believe? When we have good tidings to report, I may trouble you to be their bearer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004130_CHAINUZZお前はまたこっちに来られるんだろう？
そしたら、いいニュースがあったときには、
手紙にでもしたためて託すさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004140_CHAINUZZ<tab>There may also be less-than-good tidings...in which event, I hope I can trouble you for your counsel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004140_CHAINUZZまあ、場合によっては、よくないニュースかもしれないが……
そんなときは、相談に乗ってやってくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004150_ALPHINAUD<tab>I should be honored to provide it, Master Chai.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004150_ALPHINAUDもちろん、喜んで！
お役に立てる日を、楽しみに待ちましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004160_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, Alphinaud... I know you aren't one to sit still, but do remember to take your ease from time to time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004160_DULIACHAIがんばるあなたを、ずっと、ずっと応援しているわ。
だけど、無理はしないでね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004170_DULIACHAI<tab>And no matter where you are, remember that there are people here who are praying for your health and happiness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004170_DULIACHAIあなたが平穏と喜びで満たされますように……
そう祈り続ける人がいるってことを、どうか忘れないで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004180_DULIACHAI<tab>Our brave and gentle artist. You have our love, now and always.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004180_DULIACHAI<tab>愛しているわ、私たちの、勇敢で優しい画家さん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004190_ALPHINAUD<tab>And you mine. Please take care.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004190_ALPHINAUDはい……。
おふたりも……いつまでも、お元気で。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004200_SETO<tab>Is that...Ardbert's crystal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004200_SETO<tab>これは……もしや、アルバートのクリスタルかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004210_SETO<tab>So it is. It has changed...but I would know it anywhere. However did you come by it?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004210_SETOやっぱりそうか。
様子は変わってしまっているようだけど……。
いったいどうして、今になって……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004220_SETO<tab>...Then even in death, his enemies found a way to profit from his sacrifice. It grieves me to think of his body being used for evil ends...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004220_SETO<tab>彼の身体が、そんなことになっていたなんて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004230_SETO<tab>But thanks to you, his honor is restored, and he may finally find peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004230_SETOでも、それもキミが眠らせてくれた。
彼らの名誉を、傷つけることなく……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004240_SETO<tab>No words can express my gratitude. I will keep this crystal safe to the end of my days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004240_SETOありがとう……本当に……。
このクリスタルは、彼の思い出として、
ここで静かに護っていくよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004250_SETO<tab>Rest easy, my friend. You have earned it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004250_SETOおやすみなさい、アルバート。
今度こそ、安らかに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tell me, does anything strike you as different about my soul?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>この魂を感じ取れる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Close your eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>目を瞑ってみてほしい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004260_SETO<tab>Your soul? Hm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004260_SETO<tab>キミの魂を？　ふむ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004270_SETO<tab>Pardon? ...Hm! Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004270_SETO<tab>目を？　構わないけれど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004280_SETO<tab>How can this be?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004280_SETO<tab>この気配……そんな……なんてことだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Seto, my old friend. You've grown!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>セト、お前……本当にデカくなったなぁ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004300_SETO<tab>Oh! Oh, Ardbert! How I've missed you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004300_SETOああ……アルバート……！
会いたかった、ずっと会いたかったんだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004310_SETO<tab>I'm sorry I couldn't keep you safe... Or even console you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004310_SETO悩むキミを慰められなくて、すまなかった。
キミを庇うことができなくて、すまなかった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004320_SETO<tab>Had I only learned to speak sooner, I would have told you how much you meant to me. How much I cared.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004320_SETOもっと早くに言葉を得られたら、私がどれほどキミを好きか……
キミに幸せであってほしかったか、ちゃんと伝えられたのに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I knew. I always knew.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>馬鹿……ちゃんとわかってたさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But I'm happy to hear it nonetheless. Thank you, Seto. My partner in crime.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>ありがとな、俺の、自慢の相棒…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004350_SETO<tab>I see... His journey continues.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004350_SETO……そうか。
彼はまだそこで、旅を続けているんだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004360_SETO<tab>Then I will not yet bid him rest. With you, he may look forward to many more adventures.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004360_SETOだったら、おやすみと言うにはまだ早い。
どうか遠く、遠くまで、連れていってあげておくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004370_SETO<tab>It has been a while since last I flew. Perhaps I too will go on a little adventure. Ride the winds, seek the horizon... Yes. I think perhaps I will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004370_SETO明日は私も、久々に思い切り飛んでみようかな。
あのころみたいに、遥か高くまで、風に乗って……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004380_RUNAR<tab>Master Matoya!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004380_RUNAR<tab>マトーヤの姐さんッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004390_RUNAR<tab>For too long, I have remained silent. But no longer. I could not bear it if you were to leave. Please stay! I beg of you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004390_RUNAR姐さん……オイラ、これからもずっと姐さんといたいんだ。
いなくなるなんて寂しいこと言わないで……どうか、頼むよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004400_YSHTOLA<tab>Runar... Please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004400_YSHTOLA<tab>ルナル……あなた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004410_RUNAR<tab>...I jest. At least in part. Ahem. What I came to say is this...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004410_RUNAR……なーんて。
ごめんよ、困らせるってわかってても、
言っておきたかったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004420_RUNAR<tab>Thank you. Without your wisdom, your strength, and your kindness to guide us, our people would still be lost.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004420_RUNAR姐さん、「夜の民」に力を貸してくれて、ありがとう。
オイラたちが立ち直れたのは、
姐さんの聡明さと、強さと、優しさのおかげだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004430_RUNAR<tab>We will never forget you, Master Matoya. Wherever your journeys may take you, you will always be in our hearts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004430_RUNAR魔女マトーヤのことは、いつまでも忘れないよ。
だからどうか……向こうでも、元気でね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004435_YSHTOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004435_YSHTOLA<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004440_YSHTOLA<tab>And you in mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004440_YSHTOLA<tab>……あなたたちこそ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004450_YSHTOLA<tab>Remember that your people's journey─that <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> people's journey is yet ongoing. Your lives will change, and so too will your dreams. Yet come what may, you need not forsake your time-honored traditions, nor less your beliefs.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004450_YSHTOLA「夜の民」の祈りは、先人たちの積み重ねた叡智だわ。
生活が変われば、祈りも変わるでしょうけれど、大事になさい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004460_YSHTOLA<tab>But neither should you be beholden to them. For it was with curiosity and courage that the Night's Blessed first triumphed over adversity. New knowledge and new wisdom are ever worthy of pursuit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004460_YSHTOLAそれから、ひとりひとりが知ろうとし、
考えていくことも忘れては駄目よ。
困難を乗り越える力は、そこから生まれるのだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004470_RUNAR<tab>Indeed they are. And so, until we return to the sunless sea, we shall endeavor to live our lives to the fullest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004470_RUNARわかった、肝に銘じておくよ。
いつかこの魂が、あの美しい天の暗き海に還るまで……
みんなで、精一杯生きていこうと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004480_YSHTOLA<tab>That is well. But however great your strides, there may yet come a day when the challenges you face cannot be surmounted alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004480_YSHTOLAええ……。
だけど、皆の力と知恵を集めても、
解決しがたい難題にぶつかることがあるかもしれないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004490_YSHTOLA<tab>On such a day...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004490_YSHTOLA<tab>そんなときは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004500_RUNAR<tab>On such a day?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004500_RUNAR<tab>ど、どうすればいいんだい……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004505_YSHTOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004505_YSHTOLA<tab>フフ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004510_YSHTOLA<tab>You may call on me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004510_YSHTOLA<tab>そんなときは、きっと、私を呼びなさい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004520_YSHTOLA<tab>Since a means to travel between worlds exists, you can be sure I will find a way to employ it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004520_YSHTOLA私は魔女マトーヤよ？
世界を飛び越える術くらい、そのうち見つけ出してみせるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004530_YSHTOLA<tab>And there remain so many mysteries here that want for solving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004530_YSHTOLA<tab>……こっちにもまだ、解き明かしたい真実があることだしね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004540_RUNAR<tab>Master Matoya!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004540_RUNAR<tab>あ、姐さぁん……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004550_YSHTOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004550_YSHTOLA<tab>ちょ、ちょっと！　もう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004560_ALISAIE<tab>That's everyone, then. We've all said what we needed to.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004560_ALISAIEああ、これで全員ね。
……おかげさまで、それぞれ挨拶は済ませられたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004570_URIANGER<tab>Even as we speak, Beq Lugg undertaketh their final inspection of our spirit vessels.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004570_URIANGER今、ベーク＝ラグ殿が、
我々のソウル・サイフォンを確認してくださっています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004580_URIANGER<tab>When thine own preparations for the journey are complete, thou art to present thyself in the Ocular.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004580_URIANGER魔具を持ち帰ることになるあなたも含め、
帰還の準備ができ次第、塔の中に来てほしい……とのことです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004590_RYNE<tab>Um...everyone?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004590_RYNE<tab>……あの、みなさん！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004600_RYNE<tab>I want to thank you all. On behalf of the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004600_RYNE<tab>今まで、本当に……本当に、お世話になりました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004610_RYNE<tab>You, and Minfilia, and the Exarch.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004610_RYNE「光の氾濫」からノルヴラントを護ってくれた、ミンフィリア。
人々に希望を示し続けてくれた水晶公。
それに、「闇の戦士」となってくださったみなさん……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004620_RYNE<tab>Without each and every one of you guiding us, fighting for us...we wouldn't be standing here now. There wouldn't even <var 1A 02 /var>be<var 1A 01 /var> a here. And no words can express our gratitude.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004620_RYNEその誰が欠けても、今のこの世界はありませんでした。
私たちの感謝は……とても言葉では言い尽くせません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004630_RYNE<tab>We still have a lot to do, countless trials to overcome─but if it ever seems too much, I'll think of our time together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004630_RYNEこれからも、まだまだ大変なことはあるだろうけど……
私、そのたびにみなさんとの冒険を思い出します。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004640_RYNE<tab>The happy moments...and the sad─I will remember it all. And it will give me the strength to carry on without you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004640_RYNE嬉しかったこと、驚いたこと、苦労したこと……全部全部！
そしたらどんな困難だって、きっと乗り越えられます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004650_RYNE<tab>Because you made me who I am. Minfilia. Ryne.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004650_RYNE私、光の巫女ミンフィリアでよかった。
リーンでよかった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004660_RYNE<tab>To honor these names and these memories, I will stand with all the people of this land, and strive for a better tomorrow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004660_RYNEこれからも、この名前と思い出を連れて……
世界中のみなさんと一緒に、明日に向かって歩きます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004670_URIANGER<tab>Thancred. I believe the honor of responding should rightfully be thine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004670_URIANGERサンクレッド……。
私たちからの返事は、お任せしても？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004680_THANCRED<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004680_THANCRED<tab>ハ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004690_THANCRED<tab>I know better than most how much you've grown, and I have every confidence you'll make your people proud.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004690_THANCRED……わかってるさ。
お前がどれだけたくさん成長してきたかも……
ちゃんと、大丈夫だってことも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004700_THANCRED<tab>Gods know, I'm proud of you. I always will be. You deserve all the happiness in the world and more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004700_THANCRED<tab>……どこの空の下にいても、お前の幸せを願ってる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004710_RYNE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004710_RYNE<tab>っ…！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004720_LYNA<tab>(-???-)Might we also say a few words?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004720_LYNA<tab>(-？？？？-)私たちからも、よろしいでしょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Why, this is...just about all of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004730_ALPHINAUD<tab>皆……来てくれたのか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004740_LYNA<tab>To see you off seemed the least we could do.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004740_LYNAあなた方には、どれだけ感謝しても足りないくらいなのです。
せめて見送りくらいはさせてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004750_LYNA<tab>You risked your all for us─fought for a realm not your own. Before you came, we had never known the beauty of the night sky.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004750_LYNA皆さんのこれまでの戦いに、心から敬意を表します。
あなた方が命懸けで抗ってくれたからこそ、
私たちは、夜の闇を……その美しさを知ることができました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004760_LYNA<tab>Or the joy of your company.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004760_LYNAそして何より……戦いばかりではありましたが、
新たな仲間が増えたようで、楽しい日々でもありました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004770_LYNA<tab>Though it saddens us deeply to bid you farewell, it has ever been our way to send off friends with a smile.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004770_LYNA寂しくなりますが、前に進まんとする者は応援するのが、
クリスタリウムの街というものです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004780_LYNA<tab>Wherever your road should lead, we shall pray for your safety. And following your brave example, we shall continue to fight for the Crystarium.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004780_LYNAだから今は、ただ、あなた方の無事を願って……。
私たちも感謝を胸に、それぞれの道でがんばりたいと思います。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004790_ALISAIE<tab>With or without us, you've always taken good care of this city. I don't doubt for a moment you'll continue to do so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004790_ALISAIEそんなに肩ひじ張らなくったって、
この街については、何も心配してないわよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aye, a more resilient people we have never known.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004800_ALPHINAUDああ、強い街だからね。
それに……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004810_ALPHINAUD<tab>As resilient and enduring as the tower that watches over you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004810_ALPHINAUD彼方から届いた希望が、いつまでも、
こうして照らしてくれているのだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004820_LYNA<tab>To the last, we did not question the Exarch about his past. It is only now, when he can no longer tell us, that we believe we know the answer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004820_LYNA水晶公がどこから来た何者だったのか……
ついに本人から聞くことはできませんでしたが、
現状こそが、何よりも雄弁な答えでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004830_LYNA<tab>We have heard what became of him, and what is about to be attempted.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004830_LYNA公の身に起きたことについては、報告をいただいております。
今、どういった状態なのかも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004840_LYNA<tab>All will be well, of this we are certain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004840_LYNA……大丈夫です。
きっと全部、うまくいきます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004850_LYNA<tab>How could it be otherwise, when every soul in the Crystarium is praying for it with all their heart?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004850_LYNAこの街の皆が……
クリスタリウムで生まれ育ったすべての民が、
それを祈っているのですから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004860_LYNA<tab>And so, when our lord awakens, I bid you give him a message.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004860_LYNAだから……公が目覚め、もし私たちのことを覚えていたら、
どうか伝えてはいただけないでしょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004870_LYNA<tab>Tell him he needn't worry about us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004870_LYNA<tab>こちらの心配はいりません、と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004880_LYNA<tab>That he need no longer hide who he truly is. That he should live his own life to the fullest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004880_LYNA今度こそ、下手な隠しごとなんてせず……
思う存分、命を謳歌してください。
あなたがいつも、私たちにさせてくれたように……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004890_LYNA<tab>And that if he should ever find himself reminiscing on the past with a smile, we shall be smiling with him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004890_LYNAいつかあなたが、こちらでのことを思い出して、
ふと笑うような夜があれば……
私たちも、きっと同じように笑っています……と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004900_LYNA<tab>Will you tell him this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004900_LYNA<tab>……お願い、できますか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Word for word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>必ず、伝えよう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll do my best.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>できるかぎりは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004910_LYNA<tab>Thank you. Please look after him for us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004910_LYNAありがとうございます。
おじいちゃんのこと……私たちの公のこと……頼みますね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004920_LYNA<tab>I am sure you will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004920_LYNAできますよ、きっと……。
私はそれを、信じています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004930_YSHTOLA<tab>I daresay we have all the good wishes we can carry. Let us be on our way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004930_YSHTOLA……預かるものも預かったことだし、
そろそろ行きましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004940_BEQLUGG<tab>All right, then. Pray proceed as instructed, beginning with your memories.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004940_BEQLUGG……では、先ほど教えたとおりに進めてくれ。
まずは記憶からだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004950_URIANGER<tab>The first step is complete. And all appeareth to be in order.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004950_URIANGER<tab>うまく……いったようですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004960_ALISAIE<tab>Well, that just leaves our souls, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004960_ALISAIE<tab>なら、次はいよいよ魂よね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004970_ALISAIE<tab>We're in your hands, Angelo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004970_ALISAIE<tab>アンジェロ、頼んだわよ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004980_BEQLUGG<tab>It is done! The vessels have received of both their memories and their souls!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004980_BEQLUGGうむ、成功だっ！
きちんと記憶と魂が込められておる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004990_BEQLUGG<tab>I hereby entrust them to your care. They belong to you now. Just be sure to guard them well, yes?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_004990_BEQLUGGさあ、これは今よりおぬしの「もの」だ。
回収して、落とさんようにしっかりしまってくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005000_RYNE<tab>This <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> work, won't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005000_RYNE<tab>……大丈夫、ですよね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005010_BEQLUGG<tab>Our theories have held thus far.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005010_BEQLUGGそうだな……。
世界を超えるという点においては、ワシも素人同然だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005020_BEQLUGG<tab>But I make no promises about what is to come. Even the greatest mages in history knew better than to transport a soul across the rift. We, my dear, are in unknown territory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005020_BEQLUGGゆえに、魂を持ち帰るという点について述べるとすれば……
それもまた、確かなことは言えん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005030_BEQLUGG<tab>Prepare as we might, we cannot account for all possibilities, and it is in such circumstances that accidents are wont to occur...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005030_BEQLUGGワシも、過去の名だたる魔道士たちも、
魂のすべてを解明してはおらんのでな。
いかに準備をしようとも、事故は起き得るし……奇跡も起きる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005040_BEQLUGG<tab>Yet miracles do happen. So let us pray, and will our friends home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005040_BEQLUGG……だから、祈るのだ。
己の手が届かん領域を、せめて想いが埋めるようにな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005050_RYNE<tab>I won't stop praying until I know they're safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005050_RYNE<tab>はい……私も、精一杯祈りたいと思います。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005060_BEQLUGG<tab>All safely stowed away? I do hope so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005060_BEQLUGG<tab>うむ、全部きちんと持ったようだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005070_BEQLUGG<tab>All that remains, then, is to step into the mirror. Go now...and safe travels.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005070_BEQLUGGでは、そこの鏡の魔器から、おぬしの世界に帰るがいい。
起動されたままになっておったから、
間違いなくおぬしを送り届けてくれよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005080_ALISAIE<tab>Did it...? Are we...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005080_ALISAIE<tab>あれ……私…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005090_THANCRED<tab>...We're home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005090_THANCRED<tab>……戻ってきたんだな…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005100_TATARU<tab>Oh! Oh, you're back! You're back! You're all back!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005100_TATARUああ……みなさん……！
おはようございまっす……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005110_YSHTOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005110_YSHTOLA<tab>ふー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005120_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank you. My body feels like a sack of popotoes, but otherwise I have never felt better.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005120_YSHTOLA……ありがとう。
まだ感覚がおぼろげだけれど……
おかげさまで、無事みたいだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005130_YSHTOLA<tab>That said, I doubt any of us will be fit to travel for some while. May we leave the rest to you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005130_YSHTOLAただ……とにかく身体が重たくって……
すぐには動けそうもないから、「あと」は任せていいかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005140_URIANGER<tab>The vessel beareth our comrade's blood. With it in thy possession, the way will surely open before thee.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005140_URIANGER彼の血を用いた魔具があれば、
固く閉ざされた扉も、自ずと開かれましょう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005150_TATARU<tab>What!? But you've only just got here!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005150_TATARUえっ！？
ど、どちらへ……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005160_ALPHINAUD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005160_ALPHINAUD<tab>ふ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tataru, might I trouble you to brew us all a pot of your special tea?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005170_ALPHINAUD<tab>タタル、よければ君特製のお茶を淹れてくれるかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah! And we may require an extra cup.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005180_ALPHINAUD<tab>ひとりぶん多めに、お願いするよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Yours is a long road, my friend, and it stretches on to places beyond imagining.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005190_MYSTERYVOICE長く 長く続く道
あなたはそこを 旅し続けている

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>With your every step, these grand adventures shall grow more distant and faint.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005200_MYSTERYVOICEひとつひとつの冒険は 歩みを進めるほどに
過去になっていくだろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And there may come a day when you forget the faces and voices of those you have met along the way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005210_MYSTERYVOICEそこで出会った人々の 声を 顔を
思い出せなくなる日がきたとして――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>On that day, I bid you remember this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>そんなときには  これだけ  思い出してほしい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That no matter how far your journey may take you, you stand where you stand by virtue of the road you walked to get there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005230_MYSTERYVOICE『どんなに遠くなろうとも
すべての冒険は 今日のあなたに続いている』

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>For in times of hardship, when you fear you cannot go on...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>どれほどの苦難と  耐えがたい苦しみが襲ってこようとも

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The joy you have known, the pain you have felt, the prayers you have whispered and answered─they shall ever be your strength and your comfort.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005250_MYSTERYVOICEいつか覚えた喜びが 流した涙が 受けた祈りが
決してあなたを 独りにはしないだろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This I hope─I believe, here at memory's end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>――この記憶の最後に  私はそう願っている

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005270_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Some days later...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005270_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>――数日後

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005280_ALISAIE<tab>[LOW, ANNOYED SIGH]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005280_ALISAIE<tab>はぁ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005290_ALPHINAUD<tab>What is it, Alisaie? Are you all right? Do you still feel under the weather?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005290_ALPHINAUDどうしたんだい、アリゼー。
もしかして、まだ具合が優れないとか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005300_ALISAIE<tab>Physically, I couldn't be better. Thanks to Krile's ministrations, I'm already looking forward to our next fight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005300_ALISAIE身体はもう、バッチリ元気よ。
クルルが面倒を見ててくれたおかげで、
さほど鈍ってもいなかったしね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005310_ALISAIE<tab>But seriously─don't you have anything to say about <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005310_ALISAIE<tab>……というか、アルフィノはあれを見ても何も思わないわけ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005320_YSHTOLA<tab>No less impressive than our garments. You've outdone yourself, Tataru.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005320_YSHTOLA<tab>服もぴったりだったけれど、武器もすばらしい出来ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005330_TATARU<tab>To give credit where it's due, I had help from a certain fiery pixie who visited me in my dreams. They gave me all the information I needed to get the details just right.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005330_TATARUフッフッフ……みなさんのあちらでの装備について、
ときどき夢に現れる妖精さんに、
詳し～く教えていただいた甲斐がありまっした！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005340_TATARU<tab>For your weapons, though, I needed a <var 1A 02 /var>lot<var 1A 01 /var> more help... Thankfully, our favorite heads of state were happy to place their finest craftsmen at my exclusive disposal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005340_TATARUただ、武器は私だけじゃ再現できなくて……
実は、各国盟主のみなさんが、協力してくださったのでっす。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005350_TATARU<tab>Oh, and speaking of the Alliance leaders, they all express their “unreserved elation at your safe return,” and promise to come and see you in person as soon as they can.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005350_TATARUすぐに駆けつけられずとも、皆の帰還を心から嬉しく思う……
との伝言もお預かりしておりまっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005360_THANCRED<tab>They really needn't have gone to such trouble─but we'll be keeping these gifts all the same. Do pass on our gratitude.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005360_THANCREDずいぶんとオオゴトにされたものだが……
せっかくの逸品だ、ありがたく頂戴すると伝えておいてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005370_ALISAIE<tab>I realize we haven't taken up new martial arts, nor have I ever been one to set much store by appearances...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005370_ALISAIEそりゃあ私とアルフィノは戦い方も変わってないし、
この服だって気に入ってるわよ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005380_ALISAIE<tab>But I can't help feeling a certain lack of...I don't know, personal development.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005380_ALISAIE<tab>でも……こう……成長したって感じがないじゃないっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005390_ALPHINAUD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005390_ALPHINAUD<tab>フフッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005400_ALPHINAUD<tab>I quite understand. But as you observed, the others had the more pressing need. Rest assured, our turn will come.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005400_ALPHINAUD……まあ、いいじゃないか。
とくに今回は、私たちよりも先に装備を新調すべき御仁が、
ほかにもいたのだから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005410_KRILE<tab>If I expend any more aether, I swear I will blink out of existence. I need a bite to eat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005410_KRILEはぁー……働いた……。
これだけ魔力を使うと、さすがにお腹がペコペコよ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005420_KRILE<tab>Tataru, a cup of tea, if you would be so kind. And something sweet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005420_KRILE<tab>タタルさん、私にもお茶と……あと何か甘いもの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005430_URIANGER<tab>By Mistress Krile's exhausted state, may I assume that the ward hath been restored?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005430_URIANGERあの様子ですと……
結界の方は、無事に張り終えたのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005440_GRAHATIA<tab>(-???-)Indeed. We succeeded in weaving it anew, albeit at a slightly diminished potency than when I had Beq Lugg's assistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005440_GRAHATIA(-？？？？-)ああ、クルルにベーク＝ラグ殿の代わりをしてもらって、
どうにかこうにか、あのときの結界を再現できた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005450_GRAHATIA<tab>(-???-)It is no cause for concern, though. The tower is not easily reached, never mind breached. And even should some few succeed, their presence won't escape my notice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005450_GRAHATIA(-？？？？-)多少、強度は落ちてるが……
並大抵の奴じゃ塔に近づけないし、
もし侵入されても、オレが察知できるはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005460_URIANGER<tab>Excellent. Said duty thus discharged, thou art free to go wheresoever thy fancy taketh thee.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005460_URIANGER大変すばらしい……。
これであなたは、どこへでも行けるというわけですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005470_URIANGER<tab>Upon which note─hast thou perchance come to a decision? The offer remaineth open.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005470_URIANGERして……いかがですか？
先日の提案への、ご回答は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005480_GRAHATIA<tab>(-???-)Well...if you're certain that's what you... I-I mean, if you think I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005480_GRAHATIA<tab>(-？？？？-)う……その……それはもちろん……いいのであれば……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>どうする？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何も言わない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>G'raha, really.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>彼の名前を呼ぶ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005490_GRAHATIA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005490_GRAHATIA<tab>うぅ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005500_GRAHATIA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005500_GRAHATIA<tab>っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005510_GRAHATIA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005510_GRAHATIA<tab>はー……ええい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005520_GRAHATIA<tab>I accept. Henceforth, I shall count myself a Scion of the Seventh Dawn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005520_GRAHATIA<tab>今日から「暁の血盟」に加えてもらう、グ・ラハ・ティアだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005530_GRAHATIA<tab>G'raha Tia, at your service.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005530_GRAHATIA<tab>……こっちでも、よろしくな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005540_GRAHATIA<tab>When I was a boy, many long years ago, I yearned to stand tall as the heroes of eld.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005540_GRAHATIA――もう 遥か昔になった 子どものころ
唄に 本に謳われる 英雄が好きだった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005550_UNSETTLEDRESEARCHER<tab>Help! Somebody help!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005550_UNSETTLEDRESEARCHER<tab>た、大変だぁー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005560_UNSETTLEDRESEARCHER<tab>Hippogryphs! Hippogryphs on the rampage! A giant flock of 'em! Please, we need help!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005560_UNSETTLEDRESEARCHERすぐそこで、ヒッポグリフの大群が暴れまわってるんだ！
誰か、力を貸してくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005570_ALISAIE<tab>I could do with a little rampage myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005570_ALISAIE<tab>肩慣らしには、ちょうどよさそうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005580_ALPHINAUD<tab>What!? Now wait just a─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005580_ALPHINAUD<tab>わっ、ちょっ、アリゼー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005590_ALPHINAUD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005590_ALPHINAUD<tab>まったく……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005600_GRAHATIA<tab>But like a fool seeking to pluck the stars from the heavens, my every attempt to reprise their deeds fell short...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005600_GRAHATIAそれは 遥か届かぬ星のようで
何度まねをしてみても 本物になれることはなく――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005610_YSHTOLA<tab>I will join the fray when I've finished my tea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005610_YSHTOLA<tab>私も、このお茶をいただいたら出ようかしら……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005620_URIANGER<tab>Thus did the avatar of destruction descend, and in her wake leave naught but tears and ash...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005620_URIANGER<tab>おお、恐ろしい……あたり一面、焼け野原ですか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005630_GRAHATIA<tab>And then, one day, an all but forgotten dream from my youth stood before me, in the flesh.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005630_GRAHATIA<tab>しかし―― ある日  思いもよらず  目の前で瞬いたのだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005640_GRAHATIA<tab>So it was that a new adventure began...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005640_GRAHATIA<tab>そして始まるは  新たな冒険――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005650_ZENOS<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005650_ZENOS<tab>ふぅ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005660_ZENOS<tab>The memory of a dying world's end, night after night... And I thought it but a tired old dream.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005660_ZENOSハ……終末の記憶か……。
なるほどそうとわかれば、見飽きた夢にも見所がある……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005670_FANDANIEL<tab>I say... I knew that securing the palace would provide Your Radiance with depressingly little sport─but that you should fall asleep out of boredom!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005670_FANDANIELおやおやおや……
手始めに城を制圧してくださいとは言いましたが、
簡単すぎて居眠りとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005680_FANDANIEL<tab>Splendid! Truly splendid! And my own preparations, you will be pleased to hear, proceed apace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005680_FANDANIEL結構、実に結構です！
こちらの準備も、おかげさまで順調ですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005690_FANDANIEL<tab>Oh yes, they proceed very well indeed. Frighteningly so. And we owe it not least of all to this singularly useful body I chanced to find.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005690_FANDANIELいやいや、本当に、怖いくらい順風満帆ですねぇ。
何ってまず、ちょうどいい死体が手に入ったのが幸いでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005700_FANDANIEL<tab>With the Populares now all but destroyed, it will be the simplest of tasks to discredit their groundless assertions that I met with a grisly end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005700_FANDANIEL「俺」の死を証明していた民衆派は、もはや壊滅状態。
実は生きてましたなんて言い訳が、いくらでも通る……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005710_FANDANIEL<tab>And as the very-much-alive lord of House Brutus, I have a vast fortune at my disposal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005710_FANDANIEL加えてほら、ブルトゥス家といえば、
なかなかの富豪のようじゃあないですか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005720_FANDANIEL<tab>Ahhh, money, money, money! The great motivator! There is simply no better way to move men─and expedite plans─than with its alluring glint, would you not agree?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005720_FANDANIELいいですよねぇ、お・か・ね！
人を動かすのに、これ以上なく手っ取り早い手段でしょう？
実際、計画の進行に大いに役立ってますよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005730_FANDANIEL<tab>But wait...! Were we not acquainted, you and...“I”?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005730_FANDANIELおやいけない。
あなたと「俺」は知り合いでしたっけ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005740_FANDANIEL<tab>(-White-robed Figure-)Should our familiarity cause you distress, I beg your forgiveness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005740_FANDANIEL<tab>(-白いローブの男-)どうか気を悪くなさいませんように、殿下。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005750_ZENOS<tab>...What did you say your name was?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005750_ZENOS<tab>…………覚えはないが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005760_FANDANIEL<tab>(-White-robed Figure-)Ahhh, a dagger through my heart! That my deepest desire should forever remain unfulfilled! To live unrecognized! To die forgotten!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005760_FANDANIEL(-白いローブの男-)嗚呼、なんと哀れなことか……！
「俺」の記憶にある慕情は、永遠に報われぬものだったと！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005770_FANDANIEL<tab>(-White-robed Figure-)So it goes. Whatever this flesh may have been before, it serves only as a vessel now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005770_FANDANIEL(-白いローブの男-)ま、そういうこともありましょう。
お気になさらないでください、「俺」はあくまでただの器……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005780_FANDANIEL<tab>And I, faithful Fandaniel, labor only to advance my lord's ambitions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005780_FANDANIEL<tab>殿下と組むのは、この私……「ファダニエル」なのですから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005790_FANDANIEL<tab>Speaking of which, with the palace in our hands, we may now proceed with the next phase of the plan.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005790_FANDANIELさてさてさて……
城の制圧が終わったからには、次に進みませんとね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005800_FANDANIEL<tab>But how very odd... Despite all our havoc wreaking, old Elidibus did not deign to appear. Dare I hope...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005800_FANDANIELしかし、はて、これほど勝手に暴れてもお咎めに来ないとは、
エリディブスったら消されちゃいました？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005810_FANDANIEL<tab>That the last of the unsundered...is gone?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005810_FANDANIEL<tab>ついに？　オリジナルもこれで全滅……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005820_FANDANIEL<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005820_FANDANIEL<tab>アハハハ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005830_FANDANIEL<tab>Imagine it! Bound no more by the shackles of moldering memories─of damnable duty! Free at last to live for the moment!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005830_FANDANIELいや、結構！
カビの生えた使命やら記憶やらを、もう押し付けられない！
それよりも楽しく「今」を生きるといたしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005840_FANDANIEL<tab>Your Radiance. But give the word, and I shall go forth and prepare for you your hunting ground.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005840_FANDANIELねえ、殿下……？
そろそろ、あなた好みの狩場を「創る」といたしましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005850_GRAHATIA<tab>That which awaited was a fell beast.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005850_GRAHATIA<tab>そこで待ち受けるのは  最低の――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005860_GRAHATIA<tab>Ferocious. Ravenous. Remorseless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005860_GRAHATIA<tab>ゆえにこそ最悪な  飢えきった獣だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005870_ZENOS<tab>...Do as you will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005870_ZENOS<tab>……好きにするがいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005880_ZENOS<tab>It has been too, too long, my friend...and insufferably dull in your absence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005880_ZENOS<tab>さて、そろそろ戻っていような、友よ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005890_ZENOS<tab>When you return to me, you will share everything. Every blow will be a story unto itself. Every triumph. Every kill.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005890_ZENOS冒険の土産話は、その技で、戦いで、
たっぷりと聞かせてもらうとしよう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005900_ZENOS<tab>Rest assured we shall have a fitting stage for our reunion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005900_ZENOS<tab>……然れば、まずは舞台の準備だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05300_005910_ZENOS<tab>Oh, yes. To reprise that transcendent moment, I will set this world ablaze. And we shall dance before the pyre.
target:
